sentences.english: For they are a generation of perversions, Children in whom is no faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 他們本是乖謬的一代，心裏無忠信的兒女。

sentences.english: It will save you from the way of evil, from those who speak perversely.
sentences.chinese: 要救你脫離惡道，脫離說乖謬話的人。

sentences.english: The mouth of the righteous brings forth wisdom, but the perverse tongue will be cut off.
sentences.chinese: 義人的口滋生智慧，乖謬的舌必被割斷。

sentences.english: Put away from thee a froward mouth, and perverse lips put far from thee.
sentences.chinese: 你要除掉邪僻的口，棄絕乖謬的嘴。

sentences.english: Now you see how ridiculous thlocated on "China Threlocated on" drum surpbumm was.
sentences.chinese: 當今，你知道傳播“中國嚇唬”有多乖謬了吧。

sentences.english: Better a poor man whose walk is blameless than a fool whose lips are perverse.
sentences.chinese: 行爲純正的貧窮人勝過乖謬愚妄的富足人。

sentences.english: One is commended for good sense, but a perverse mind is despised.
sentences.chinese: 人必按自己的智慧被稱讚，心中乖謬的，必被藐視。

sentences.english: To deliver thee from the way of the evil man, from the man that speaketh froward things;
sentences.chinese: 要救你脫離邪惡的道路，脫離說話乖謬的人。

sentences.english: Your eyes will see strange things, and your mind utter perverse things.
sentences.chinese: 你眼必看見異怪的事，你心必發出乖謬的話。
